english: Do you really think Tom can win?

japanese: トムは勝てるって、あなた本気で思ってるの？
english: Do you really think Tom can win?

japanese: 私のサンドイッチ食べたの、トムだったの？
english: Was it Tom who ate my sandwich?

japanese: この色、素敵だと思わない？
english: Don't you think this color is nice?

japanese: トムが最後のようだ。
english: It looks like Tom will be last.

japanese: まだウェイターしてるんだよね？
english: You're still a waiter, aren't you?

japanese: 何でトムは家にいないんだろう。
english: I wonder why Tom isn't at home.

japanese: なぜトムはそれが出来ないんだろう。
english: I wonder why Tom can't do that.

japanese: トム、勝てるかしら？
english: I wonder whether Tom could win.

japanese: トムはまだ怒ってるのかしら？
english: I wonder if Tom is still upset.

japanese: トムって、まだイラついてるのかな？
english: I wonder if Tom is still upset.

japanese: このスープ、あまり美味しくない。
english: This soup doesn't taste very good.

japanese: このスープ、イマイチだね。
english: This soup doesn't taste very good.

japanese: トムは青のセーターは着てなかったよ。
english: Tom wasn't wearing a blue sweater.

japanese: トムが着てたのは青いセーターじゃなかったよ。
english: Tom wasn't wearing a blue sweater.

japanese: トムとまだ友達なの？
english: Are you still friends with Tom?

japanese: これはトムが使ったカップですか？
english: Is this the cup that Tom used?

japanese: 今日ボストンから帰ってきたところだよ。
english: I just got back from Boston today.

japanese: トムは機嫌が悪そうだった。
english: Tom looked like he was displeased.

japanese: トムは今もホームシックだと思うよ。
english: I think Tom is still homesick.

japanese: トムはまだ自分の部屋にいるはずだ。
english: Tom is probably still in his room.

japanese: それやる許可は取ったの？
english: Did you get permission to do that?

japanese: まだバスを待ってるの？
english: Are you still waiting for the bus?

japanese: まだ宿題やってるの？
english: Are you still doing your homework?

japanese: こちらがお探しのものでしょうか？
english: Are these what you're looking for?

japanese: トムが気づいてるなんて、知らなかった。
english: I didn't know Tom had noticed.

japanese: トムに自分の意見に同意するかどうか、聞かれました。
english: Tom asked me if I agreed with him.

japanese: トムは自分でそれができると思ってるの？
english: Does Tom think he can do that?

japanese: 普段どこで買い物をするの？
english: Where do you usually go shopping?

japanese: トムのこと、まだ待ってるの？
english: Are you still waiting for Tom?

japanese: トムは今日家に帰ってくるの？
english: Will Tom get back home today?

japanese: この絵は、とても高かったんですよ。
english: This painting was very expensive.

japanese: 夕飯の後、トムは何をしたの？
english: What did Tom do after dinner?

japanese: みんな同じホテルに泊まろうよ。
english: Let's all stay at the same hotel.

japanese: みんな一緒のホテルに泊まりましょう。
english: Let's all stay at the same hotel.

japanese: トムならできるって言っただろ。
english: I told you Tom could do that.

japanese: それはトムでもできると思うんだ。
english: I think even Tom can do that.

japanese: トムと一緒によく買い物に行く。
english: I often go shopping with Tom.

japanese: 今週はできると思うよ。
english: I think we can do that this week.

japanese: ３年間、フランス語を勉強したよ。
english: I studied French for three years.

japanese: フランス語は３年間勉強したよ。
english: I studied French for three years.

japanese: トムは頑固なんだってね。
english: I heard that Tom is stubborn.

japanese: トムは私があまり上手く歌えないことを知っている。
english: Tom knows I can't sing very well.

japanese: 台風が来てるって。
english: I heard that a typhoon is coming.

japanese: まだ自分のチケット代を払っていない。
english: I haven't paid for my ticket yet.

japanese: トムって、あなたと一緒に泳ぎに行ったの？
english: Did Tom go swimming with you?

japanese: トムがあなたと泳ぎに行たの？
english: Did Tom go swimming with you?

japanese: ほんの少ししかフランス語は話せないよ。
english: I can speak only a little French.

japanese: うちの家から富士山が見えるんだよ。
english: I can see Mt. Fuji from my house.

japanese: まだ暗いところが怖いの？
english: Are you still afraid of the dark?

japanese: トムはまだおなかを空かせていると思う。
english: I think Tom is still hungry.

japanese: この道路は昨年拡張された。
english: This road was widened last year.

japanese: トムは勝てないと思うけどな。
english: I don't believe Tom can win.

japanese: お昼ご飯食べてからやるよ。
english: I'll do that after eating lunch.

japanese: 私も先週ボストンに行ったのよ。
english: I went to Boston last week, too.

japanese: トムは本当に勝てたの？
english: Was Tom really able to win?

japanese: ここを早く離れた方がいいと思う。
english: I think we'd better leave early.

japanese: トムは何であんなかんかんに怒っているんだろう。
english: I wonder why Tom is so mad.

japanese: 何でトムってあんなに太ってるんだろう。
english: I wonder why Tom is so fat.

japanese: トムはまだ怒ってると思うよ。
english: I think Tom is still angry.

japanese: トムにボストンを案内してあげたんだ。
english: I showed Tom around Boston.

japanese: 酔っ払っているのはトムだけだ。
english: Tom is the only one who's drunk.

japanese: まだトムとは友達なの？
english: Are you still Tom's friend?

japanese: トムがアイスを全部食べちゃったのよ。
english: Tom has eaten all the ice cream.

japanese: もう一度お願いできますか。
english: Could you please say that again?

japanese: 今も仕事を探してるの？
english: Are you still looking for a job?

japanese: トムの買った車は赤だよ。
english: The car Tom bought is red.

japanese: 今も胸の痛みがありますか？
english: Are you still having chest pain?

japanese: 今でもそれを買うつもりなの？
english: Are you still going to buy that?

japanese: ちょっと待っててってトムに伝えといて。
english: Tell Tom to wait a moment.

japanese: 整備士ではないんですね？
english: You're not a mechanic, are you?

japanese: トムは勝てると確信している。
english: I'm convinced Tom can win.

japanese: トムは何で怒ってるのかな。
english: I wonder why Tom is angry.

japanese: トムはいつもひとりで家に帰る。
english: Tom always goes home by himself.

japanese: トムの犬は私の犬ほど大きくないわ。
english: Tom's dog isn't as big as mine.

japanese: トムはまだ家にいると思うよ。
english: I think Tom is still home.

japanese: トムはまだ家なんじゃない。
english: I think Tom is still home.

japanese: トムの笑い方って好きだな。
english: I like the way Tom laughs.

japanese: トムは私を見ても驚かなかった。
english: Tom wasn't surprised to see me.

japanese: コンサートは３時間でした。
english: The concert lasted three hours.

japanese: トムが私に言ったことは本当なの？
english: Is what Tom told me true?

japanese: ボストンの大学に行くんだ。
english: I'm going to college in Boston.

japanese: トムが泳げるの知ってるよ。
english: I know that Tom can swim.

japanese: トムが泳げることは知っています。
english: I know that Tom can swim.

japanese: ２時半までには家に帰るって、トムが言ってたよ。
english: Tom said he'd get home by 2:30.

japanese: トムに勝ってほしくなかったんだ。
english: I didn't want Tom to win.

japanese: 一日中雨が降らなきゃいいんだけど。
english: I hope it doesn't rain all day.

japanese: どうするかはまだ決まっていません。
english: I haven't decided what I'll do.

japanese: トムがやっと泣き止んだよ。
english: Tom has finally stopped crying.

japanese: トムならもう泣き止んでるよ。
english: Tom has already stopped crying.

japanese: トムのためにそれをしたの？
english: Did you do that for Tom?

japanese: トムは去年の夏にボストンで死んだ。
english: Tom died in Boston last summer.

japanese: ビール飲む？
english: Do you want to drink some beer?

japanese: 今でも私のこと心配してくれてるの？
english: Are you still worried about me?

japanese: まだ気分が冴えないの？
english: Are you still not feeling well?

japanese: まだ気分が悪いの？
english: Are you still not feeling well?

japanese: まだ痛みがひどいですか？
english: Are you still in a lot of pain?

japanese: 今でも野球は得意？
english: Are you still good at baseball?

japanese: 今でもヘビが怖いの？
english: Are you still afraid of snakes?

japanese: 今でもコーヒー党なの？
english: Are you still a coffee drinker?

japanese: ホームレスみたいな格好だな。
english: You look like you're homeless.

japanese: トムは今日、何をしたの？
english: What did Tom do today?

japanese: トムが、ケガはなかったと言ってました。
english: Tom told me he wasn't injured.

japanese: どうしてトムは笑わなかったんだ？
english: Why didn't Tom laugh?

japanese: ボストンはシカゴより大きいの？
english: Is Boston bigger than Chicago?

japanese: ボストンってシカゴよりでかいの？
english: Is Boston bigger than Chicago?

japanese: トムに嘘をついたりしないよ。
english: I'd never lie to Tom.

japanese: 明日ボストンに行きます。
english: I'm coming to Boston tomorrow.

japanese: 君と一緒のことをします。
english: I'll do the same thing you do.

japanese: 来週の月曜日はボストンにいるんだ。
english: I'll be in Boston next Monday.

japanese: トムはワインを開けた。
english: Tom opened the bottle of wine.

japanese: トムはワインボトルを開けた。
english: Tom opened the bottle of wine.

japanese: トムは何を観ていますか？
english: What's Tom watching?
